Description: Three beads made of different shape and material. A: One cylindrical segmented bead made of white faience. B: One disc-shaped bead made of white faience. C: One roundish barrel-shaped bead made of jasper.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E14.4, late walls outside E14.19
Acquisition notes: Formerly housed by the Birmingham Museum and Art Gallery and the EES London.
